div.div: Ἀμφι-άρᾱος : a seer and warrior of Argos, son of Oecles, great grandson of the seer Melampus. Through the treachery of his wife Eriphȳle, who was bribed by Polynīces with the gift of a golden necklace, he was forced to meet his death by joining the expedition of the Seven against Thebes, Od. 15.244.
From A Homeric Dictionary (Georg Autenrieth, New York, Harper and Brothers, 1891)
